snippet.title: Arelite Core 2017 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
ARELITE CORE launches February 8th. Buy it on http://arelitecore.com/ and on Steam http://store.steampowered.com/app/466160

Facebook ►► https://www.facebook.com/DragonSlumberGames/
Twitter ►► https://twitter.com/dragon_slumber
Website ►► http://www.arelitecore.com
Twitch ►► https://www.twitch.tv/dragonslumber

Music Provided by Epidemic Sound: Sea Adventures 4 - Johannes Bornlöf

ARELITE CORE, a story-driven JRPG for Windows. It follows the adventures of Karden, a blacksmith on the path to mastering his craft, forced to take a stand against an ageless entity bent on devouring the world. Through its 20 hour epic cinematic story, its reimagined battle system and a killer soundtrack, ARELITE CORE seeks to relive the glory of the 16 bit era as we remember it.

I have worked on this game mostly alone for nearly five years, and invested over 50 000$ of my own money into producing it. I have programmed the entire engine myself in XNA, wrote the design and script and hired over 20 artists for the art and soundtrack.
